title: Sleep Number CEO on Growth and Innovation
description: Linda Findley, Sleep Number CEO, discusses the company’s outlook, growth, and innovation with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” She says the company is exploring new distribution channels. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Linda Findley, Sleep Number CEO, discusses the company’s outlook, growth, and innovation with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” She says the company is exploring new distribution channels. (Source: Bloomberg)
